channel.title: Map the Community on Google Maps!
channel.description:
Hi folks,
just for fun ...
[url]https://maps.google.com/maps/ms?ie=UTF&msa=0&msid=111844884429384710023.00046a7d9699161aa4488[/url]
put your pin on where you live, with your nick and involvement in the project if you like. If privacy is a concern, just put the name of the city (no street address)
Ciao!
EDIT: I made the map open for modifications to all so that everybody will be able to participate, but not searchable (you need the link above) to make sure that people roaming the forums are the most likely to contribute

item.title: Map the Community on Google Maps!
item.dc:creator: blue
item.description:
Lamsey:

Step 1: Find your home in the map.
Step 2: Click the ‘edit’ button in the left sidebar.
Step 3: Click the ‘marker’ button at the top left of the map.
Step 4: Click where you want your marker to be placed.
Step 5: Fill in details (you can change colour by clicking the icon in the top right of the bubble).
Step 6: Close the bubble.
Step 7: Click the ‘done’ button in the left hand sidebar.

i cant find the edit option ;f

Read full topic
